venue.name: Online Flex Meetup Group Connect Room

item.description:
Greg Lafrance will be presenting at the march March meeting about converting Flex 3 applications to Flex 4. 

Greg is from Cupertino, California and is a Senior Flex Developer at vChatter, a video chat provider.  He is ACE Certified in Flex 2 and 3, and has worked for Adobe for over 8 years.  His hobbies include running, chess, Flex, and Ruby on Rails. 


You can join in at http://experts.na3.acrobat.com/ofmg/

Check what time this occurs in your time zone at:
http://www.timeanddate.com/worldclock/fixedtime.html?hour=18&min=0&sec=0&p1=98


LOGGING IN: When you login to the Connect room (the link above)
to view the meeting, PLEASE USE THE "LOGIN AS GUEST" option, and USE YOUR NAME, but do NOT
attempt to use your meetup.com username/password or any Connect account. Just sign in as a guest.


ADD THIS TO YOUR CALENDAR: Want to add this event to your own personal calendar? Click the link
on the top of the event page, below the event title, saying, "Export to a calendar", which offers
calendar downloads for Outlook, iCal, Google, and Yahoo calendars.
item.name: Converting From Flex to Flex 4 by Greg Lafrance
